location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 1661 of 1822 from Secretary to the Government of Bombay to Lieutenant John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulph [Gulf]

mods.abstract: Encloses copy of instructions issued to the Senior Officer of the Honorable Company's Marine in the Persian Gulf in light of the withdrawal from the island of Kishm and informs MacLeod that the Honorable Governor in Council requests that he submit to him any suggestions he may have regarding these instructions.
